EmailTemplate.description: PSA-IQVIAPSA-5348 - Relieve Secondary BRM Analyst Assignment Email
EmailTemplate.name: AGG_ET21_PSA_Relieve Secondary BRM Analyst Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Aggregate Report Secondary BRM Analyst Assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Secondary BRM Analyst listed on Aggregate Report: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Name} has changed.
The new Secondary BRM Analyst is: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Secondary_BRM_Analyst__c}.
Please contact your line manager if you have any questions.
Thank You.
